headDescription: ICRAFT has a range of packages to suit your web design needs. Check out these web design packages to get an idea today :). For a free consultation we're located in Auckland.
jumbotronSubTitle: So you can understand what goes into a website.

packageItems.info: Ensuring your website works across a range of commonly used browsers including Chrome, IE, Edge, Firefox and Safari.
packageItems.moreInfo: Making your website work on every browser is not very cost efficient and it limits the creative freedom of an website. Some agencies support ancient browsers, some only support the latest and sometimes it depends on the nature of the product but here at ICRAFT we choose to support upwards of 95% of browsers.

packageItems.info: Making your website look good on a range of different devices from phones to tablet to desktop devices.
The number of pages the website will have. For example a Home, Contact and About page will be 3 pages.

A domain is the address that the website is located at. For example www.icraft.co.nz is our domain. This is also associated with emails so you can have email addresses like info@icraft.co.nz. They typically cost between $30-$40 a year.
This allows you to have an email address associated with the domain name. You can have multiple address's or one address. These come at a yearly cost from anywhere between $2-$10 a month.
This provides a few options to help the search engines like google find your website.
The number of times you can provide feedback during the development process so we can adjust your website before it goes live.
Google Maps provides uses the power of Google's amazing maps platform. This gives visitors the ability to find the physical location of your store, business or place of operation.
Having a contact form can help with conversion rates. This means that people are more likely to get in touch with you.
If you want something that is unique with effective animations, engaging sound effects and or custom visual effects. This is for you!
A blog is great for Search Engine Optimization (SEO). It helps your site rank higher on google and also helps your brand act as an authority in the industry its in.
A chat bot can help streamline and automatic common communication you might face with returning visitors.
A store is a website that allows the ability to display and handle the processing of a variety of products all on one platform.

title: Take a look at our eb design packages
subTitle: Built with the latest technology and current web design trends, our packages suite a variety of needs.
disclaimer: These packages give you an outline of what we can do, each package will be customized to your individual needs. If you'd like to know what package best suites you â€” find out by clicking Discover below. Otherwise view our packages.
